endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of hotels based on specified filters such as location and ratings.
Fetch the available rooms in a specified hotel for a certain date range.
Create a new reservation for a hotel room including guest details.
Fetch the details of an existing reservation by reservation ID.
Update the details of an existing reservation identified by reservation ID.
Cancel an existing reservation by its unique identifier.
Retrieve a list of amenities available at a specific hotel or room.
Submit a review for a hotel or service by a guest.
Fetch all reviews for a specified hotel by its unique ID.
Retrieve the booking history for a specific user identified by their unique ID.
